sprykerComponent.name: review-summary
sprykerComponent.readme: Displays a section with a list of reviews, average, and detailed rating.

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
reviews: required,
    summary: required,
    ratingMaxValue: required,
    hasCustomer: required,

    pagination: {
        parameters: required,
        currentPage: required,
        paginationPath: required,
        maxPage: required,
        showAlwaysFirstAndLast: true,
        anchor: 'product-reviews'
    }
